PROJECTS
1. Student Result Management System : -
Student Result Management System is a Web based Application Developed for 
Colleges to Analyze the Result and keep the Track of Students.
Technology :- Java ( Eclipse IDE), HTML, CSS & JavaScript (For Front End), MYSQL 
Database.
2. Daily Dukaan : -
Dukaan is a DIY platform that enables merchants with zero programming skills to 
set up their e-commerce store using smartphones in 30 seconds.
It powers over 2 million small and medium-sized businesses across India to start, 
grow, market and manage their businesses over the internet.
 In short, the app is helping create a large impact across the country and Making 
“Digital India” truly come to life.
Technology : - HTML, CSS & JavaScript
